cast.original_title: Perfume: The Story of a Murderer
cast.overview: Jean-Baptiste Grenouille, born in the stench of 18th century Paris, develops a superior olfactory sense, which he uses to create the world's finest perfumes. However, his work takes a dark turn as he tries to preserve scents in the search for the ultimate perfume.
cast.title: Perfume: The Story of a Murderer

details.biography:
Harris Gordon was born in Canada. He completed his acting studies at East 15 Acting School in London and L’École Internationale de Théâtre Jacques Lecoq in Paris. Harris Gordon is a theatre actor (Teatre Nacional De Catalunya, Els Comediants, Georges Lavaudant…), a television actor (El Gran Nord, Hombres de Paco, Cuenta Atrás…) and a cinema actor (Perfume, Anna, Educación de las Hadas…).

He has directed 2 theatre plays, “Gulietta” with Pepa Plana and “Buscant Abraham” with Carles Chamarro and Toni Gonzalez. He is a member of the UK Professional Choreographers of Stage Combat and of the Ski Instructors Association in Canada.

For more than 20 years he has been a teacher at Estudis Berty Tovías –International Theatre School. At present he is a teacher at Teatracció International Theatre School.
details.name: Harris Gordon
